alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Yakutat; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 2:17PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Heavy Precipitation Will Impact the Outer Coast Through The Weekend... A low pressure system and associated front over the Gulf of Alaska will steer a plume of subtropical moisture over the eastern Gulf and Southeast Alaska late this week and into the weekend. Greatest storm totals will occur in areas north of Cross Sound and west of Lynn Canal. Most of the precipitation is expected to fall throughout the day Friday and into Saturday evening before tapering off. Soon after this system, another low will enter the Gulf, bringing more precipitation to the area for the start of next week. There is still some uncertainty with regards to timing and strength for this second system, but confidence is increasing.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Yakutat; Glacier Bay
